C

calculateGrade(int) - Static method in class Choice
Calculates a grade from a user input (percentage) according to these grade boundaries: A: >69 B: >59 C: >49 D: >39 E: <40
checkPercentage() - Static method in class Choice
Input validity check for the grade calculator.
Choice - Class in <Unnamed>
Contains static methods for menu options.
Choice() - Constructor for class Choice
